forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 95, with temperatures falling to around 91 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. North wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
